attributes.action: Allocated Seperate Frequency for Wireless Household Security Equipment (CCTV)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present both Wireless Internet and Household Security equipment use the same frequency to operate. This means that you can only have one or the other running.  If you use the Household Security Equipment (CCTV) there is a good chance it will effectively block ALL Wireless Internet equipment within a 200m radius.
